feels.name: Isolation
feels.quote: Ahab's soul, shut up in the caved trunk of his body, there fed upon the sullen paws of its gloom!

feels.name: Despair
feels.quote: Ahab's soul, shut up in the caved trunk of his body, there fed upon the sullen paws of its gloom!

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: Dough-Boy's whole life was one continual lip-quiver.

feels.name: Contentment
feels.quote: Such portentous appetites had Queequeg and Tashtego, that to fill out the vacancies made by the previous repast, often the pale Dough-Boy was fain to bring on a great baron of salt-junk.

Places.name: Masthead
Places.description: The top of the mast on a ship
